Low Prices for Mega-PAW End Friday – Predictive Analytics World & Deep Learning World in Vegas

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Deep Learning, Las Vegas, NV, PAW, Predictive Analytics, Predictive Analytics World

This Friday, April 27 is the regular pricing deadline for Mega-PAW 2018, June 3-7 in Las Vegas. Don't miss your chance to save up to $450.00 when you register for the 2018 event.


Regular Rates Expire This Week

All great things come to an end, and these great rates are no exception. This Friday, April 27 is the regular pricing deadline for Mega-PAW 2018, June 3-7 in Las Vegas. Don't miss your chance to save up to $450.00 when you register for the 2018 event.

The first ever Mega-PAW will feature four content vertical events — PAW Business, PAW Financial, PAW Healthcare, and PAW Manufacturing — alongside the inaugural Deep Learning World.

This 5-conference mega-event will feature case studies from:

... and many more. See the Mega-PAW overview as well as the detailed Mega-PAW agenda.


Hear what past attendees have to say about Predictive Analytics World events:

"I like how open the presenters are in terms of sharing what their companies are doing and how they got there. This openness makes it easier to relate to my own business problems and gives me plenty of good ideas to try out."

- Alexis Woodley, Pella Corporation

"Practical and with a helpful variety of vertical industry examples. The speakers were the top people in predictive analytics."
- William Yarberry, ICCM Consulting, LLC
 
"PAW Business was a great conference. I really enjoyed the presentations and getting to talk with data scientist from across America and from many different fields."

- Dovid Burns, B&H Photo
"The presentations are only a fortunate byproduct; the real treasure is all of the people and conversations that happen during the coffee breaks."

- Richard Lee, John Hancock

Check out the full agenda and see all the reasons why you can't miss the largest PAW event to date. Rates go up after this Friday — register today and save.
 

Conference produced by: Rising Media & Prediction Impact


Privacy Policy
